name: Apocatlypse Meow
description:
The Apocatlypse is now! A brave cat against deadly generic robots in a post apocalyptic world! Take control of Great, a fearless cat capable of bending the gravity to his own will and fight against the enemy which captured humanity: robots.

You will be able to jump, run and dash throught a fast paced platformer game where robot with lasers and missiles will try to stop you! Face tremendous boss fights and save your beloved kitten!

Apocatlypse Meow is a platform game developed for the Video game Design and Programming course at the Politecnico di Milano. More information at:

http://www.polimigamecollective.org
